doc:
Mary Scheer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Scheer 0 Mary Scheer is an American actress, comedian, screenwriter and producer. She is best known as one of the original cast members of the sketch comedy series MADtv and for playing Freddie's mother, Marissa Benson, on iCarly. She also played Alice the Zookeeper on The Penguins of Madagascar. She played Gladys on Disney Channel's TV series, Bunk'd. Mary_Scheer is an_American_actress , comedian , screenwriter_and_producer . She is_best_known as one of the_original_cast_members of the_sketch_comedy_series_MADtv and for playing Freddie 's_mother , Marissa_Benson , on iCarly . She also played Alice the_Zookeeper on The_Penguins of Madagascar . She played Gladys on Disney_Channel 's_TV_series , Bunk_'d .
